thread.title: Mary Thorsfeldt
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Mary Thorsfeldt

author: Mary Thorsfeldt
title: Mary Thorsfeldt
text: I was going thru a divorce, didn't have a bed to sleep in. I had moved that day into an apartment, was starting over. I went into American freight sales person was very knowledgeable. He arranged for bed to be delivered that day. Which was sweet. Delivery guys were awesome as well. They also set up my bed for me, which saved myself grief. Very professional from showroom to delivery. Thank you so much, I appreciate your service more than you know.
